io.libsoft.contactcard.service

Class ImageProcessingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.libsoft.contactcard.service.ImageProcessingService

  • public class ImageProcessingService
extends Object
    Class implementing the singleton pattern, providing LiveData for the TessBaseAPI.

    • Method Summary

        Live data for the OCR results

      • getCroppedImage

        public Bitmap getCroppedImage(Bitmap bitmap)
        Crops the Bitmap from the camera stream using the median Rect from the previous X contour searches, where X is a chosen threshold.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - to be cropped from the camera stream
        Returns:
        A cropped bitmap bounded by the bounding box containing the card.

      • performOcr

        public void performOcr(File file)
        Performs Ocr on an image from file.
        Parameters:
        file - File the file to be read and parsed via OCR

      • findCard

        public Cropper findCard(Bitmap bitmap)
        Attempts to find the card within the camera stream image from a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - from the camera sensor.
        Returns:
        Cropper a Cropper, which contains the original Image bitmap, a bounding box, if a card was found and the cropped bitmap image.

      • fileToBitmap

        public Bitmap fileToBitmap(String file)
        Method to parse a file and return its bitmap representation.
        Parameters:
        file - to be loaded.
        Returns:
        Bitmap loaded from the file.

      • getCandidates

        public LiveData<List<org.opencv.core.Rect>> getCandidates()
        Returns the live data implementation of the Rect candidates for cropping the stream image.
        Returns:
        Live data of List containing an accumulation of Rects.
